Lyrics: Sempre mi ride sta donna da bene
Poetic Translation: Always this lady laughs, laughs at me always

Lyrics: Quando passeggio per mezzo sta via
Poetic Translation: When we in any street pass by each other.

Lyrics: La riderella, la pazzarella non vi ca ride,
Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.
Poetic Translation: That flirting ninny, that little nitwit can't help but giggle,

Lyrics: ha ha ha! ridemo tutti per darli piacere.
Poetic Translation: Ha ha ha! We all should laugh now; let's laugh just to please her.
